title: Tasty Methi Malai Chicken Recipe
content:
Delicious and creamy methi malai chicken which tastes great with rice or roti. This gravy goes perfect with pulao as well.

When I was looking for dinner inspiration online, I came across a picture of a spicy chicken curry served with some naan. I got so inspired by that so I made it almost immediately.

This chicken dish is so easy to make, you don't need coconut or any other kinds of stuff. If you use larger chicken pieces then it will be tastier. I used small cut chicken because of what I had on hand.

 

Methi Malai Chicken Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 40 mins

Total time: 50 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 3 servings

 

Ingredients

Oil - 3 tablespoons

Cumin Seeds / Shahi Jeera - 1 teaspoon

Onion - 2 chopped finely

Ginger Garlic paste - 1 tablespoon

Green Chillies - 4 slit

Chicken - 500 grams

Salt to taste

Yogurt / Curd - 1 cup

Garam Masala Powder - 2 teaspoons

Pepper Powder - 2 teaspoons

Kasuri Methi Leaves - ¼ cup

Fresh Cream - ½ cup

 

Instructions

Heat oil in a pan. Add in shahi jeera and let it sizzle.

Add in onions, cook till golden.

Add in ginger garlic paste, green chilies and mix well.

Add in chicken and mix well.

Add in salt, turmeric and mix well.

Add in yogurt and mix well. Cover and cook till chicken is done.

Add in pepper powder, garam masala powder and mix well.

Add in cream and mix well.

Take it off the heat and serve it.
